TriggerOraclev10g.name: c2_autoinsert_services
TriggerOraclev10g.body: BEGIN<br/> INSERT INTO C2_ENTITIES (ENTITY_ID, VERSION) VALUES (C2_ENTITIES_SEQ.nextval, 0);<br/> <br/> INSERT INTO C2_ITEMS (ITEM_ID, LABEL) VALUES (C2_ENTITIES_SEQ.currval, 'US≈ÅUGA#' || to_char(:service.SERVICE_ID));<br/><br/> INSERT INTO C2_ITEMS_SERVICE (ITEM_ID, SERVICE_ID) VALUES (C2_ENTITIES_SEQ.currval, :service.SERVICE_ID);<br/>END;
